member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.createBox(Unigine.Math.vec3)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic mesh in a form of a box.
member.param: Box size along the X, Y and Z axes.

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.createCapsule(float,float,int,int)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic mesh in a form of a capsule.
member.param: Number of stacks that divide the capsule radially.
Number of slices that divide the capsule horizontally.

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.createCylinder(float,float,int,int)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic mesh in a form of a cylinder.
member.param: Number of stacks that divide the cylinder radially.
Number of slices that divide the cylinder horizontally.

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.createDodecahedron(float)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic mesh in a form of a dodecahedron.

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.createIcosahedron(float)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic mesh in a form of an icosahedron.

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.createPlane(float,float,float)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic mesh in a form of a plane. It is divided into equal squares whose size is defined by the given step.
member.param: Step of surface subdivision (vertical and horizontal).

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.createPrism(float,float,float,int)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic mesh in a form of a prism.
member.param: Radius of the circle circumscribed about the top prism base.
Radius of the circle circumscribed about the bottom prism base.

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.createSphere(float,int,int)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic mesh in a form of a sphere.
member.param: Number of stacks that divide the sphere radially.
Number of slices that divide the sphere horizontally.

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.addBoxSurface(Unigine.Ptr{ObjectMeshDynamic},Unigine.Math.vec3,Unigine.Math.mat4)
member.summary: Appends a box of the specified size to ObjectMeshDynamic.
member.param: Box size along the X, Y and Z axes.

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.addCapsuleSurface(Unigine.Ptr{ObjectMeshDynamic},float,float,Unigine.Math.mat4,int,int)
member.summary: Appends a capsule of the specified size to ObjectMeshDynamic. The stacks and slices specify the surface's subdivision.
member.param: Capsule height along the central axis.
Number of stacks that divide the capsule radially.
Number of slices that divide the capsule horizontally.

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.addCylinderSurface(Unigine.Ptr{ObjectMeshDynamic},float,float,Unigine.Math.mat4,int,int)
member.summary: Appends a cylinder of the specified size to ObjectMeshDynamic. The stacks and slices specify the surface's subdivision.
member.param: Number of stacks that divide the cylinder radially.
Number of slices that divide the cylinder horizontally.

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.addDodecahedronSurface(Unigine.Ptr{ObjectMeshDynamic},float,Unigine.Math.mat4)
member.summary: Appends a dodecahedron (a polyhedron with twelve flat faces) of the specified size to ObjectMeshDynamic.

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.addIcosahedronSurface(Unigine.Ptr{ObjectMeshDynamic},float,Unigine.Math.mat4)
member.summary: Appends a icosahedron (a polyhedron with twenty flat faces) of the specified size to ObjectMeshDynamic.

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.addPlaneSurface(Unigine.Ptr{ObjectMeshDynamic},float,float,float,Unigine.Math.mat4)
member.summary: Appends a plane surface to the dynamic mesh. The plane is divided into equal squares, size of which is defined by the given step.
member.param: Step of surface subdivision (vertical and horizontal).

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.addPrismSurface(Unigine.Ptr{ObjectMeshDynamic},float,float,float,Unigine.Math.mat4,int)
member.summary: Appends a prism to the dynamic mesh.
member.param: Radius of the circle circumscribed about the top prism base.
Radius of the circle circumscribed about the bottom prism base.
Dimension of the prism's central axis.

member.name: M:Unigine.Primitives.addSphereSurface(Unigine.Ptr{ObjectMeshDynamic},float,Unigine.Math.mat4,int,int)
member.summary: Appends a sphere surface to the dynamic mesh. The stacks and slices specify the surface's subdivision.
member.param: Number of stacks that divide the sphere radially.
Number of slices that divide the sphere horizontally.
